Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a pale red-brown pottery storage-vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393757) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393757)
